title: Modrinther

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Installing a mod onto someone allows you to give them a new ability or attribute. The host may rule 17 your ability.
- If you can correctly guess a player's role, you may modify any abilities or attributes they have.
- You may only target other Mafia members once and may not self target.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who will not submit to the Mafia.

desc:
Post 5298
*Better than Curseforge! ignore the mods that are stuck on curseforge*
